Articles.Content:
I decided to purchase KSP as a birthday gift for myself during the Steam sale. I decided that I just had to have this game after watching all of the awesome You tube videos by Scott Manley, Skye Storme, Quill18, Asher Gaming, and EnterElysium. Was not disappointed...

I love this game! 10 of 10! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello chaliceofdeath and welcome to the KSP forums!

Good to have you aboard. You may find some others around here who also love this game. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Happy landings!
Ore is your best friend! Daily 5 words of advice.
